column5: Sprawling ranch house in the country 20 minutes from Texas Motor Speedway, 20 minutes from Denton, home of TWU, UNT, and NCTC colleges. Ramp in front provides handicap accessible access, with 1 shower, that is handicapped accessible. okay for kids, sleeps 10 with floor space available for up to 14, great area for walking. Hosts on premises. Events, and Experiences at this beautiful farm listed seperately
